MajorClaims.Text: teenagers need more attention and help in comparison with the higher ages
it is a good idea to ask parents and adult relatives to give a piece of advice

Claims.Text: they are the best advisor for their children
parents and adults relatives are the best friends and consular for the teenagers

Premises.Text: parents and other adult relatives are more experienced towards children
if children listen to their advices they can prevent happening worst things
They have experienced a large numbers of stuffs during their life
they can save value things in their life such as time and money, and enjoy they life with the best way
unfortunately nowadays there are some individuals who cheat the others for gaining more power and money
they believe they are immature and they can trap them easily
